body:
Comment 4 by **mklencke**: 
This may be the same problem? The bug is not 100% reproducable but will eventually show
up. I fidgeted around with the code for quite some time and with some code changes (just
inserting print statements here and there) I can't reproduce it anymore.

Also on 386. c5c62aeb6267 tip
Attachments: 1. trace.txt (31202 bytes)
